Title: Circle of Friends
Plot: The police identify the Ice Truck Killer. However Dexter feels there is something wrong with the suspect. Dexter must also deal with Paul, Rita's recently paroled husband.
GuestStars: Jayden Lund, Darcy Fowers, Bunnie Rivera, Sewell Whitney, Alex Demir, Colton James, David Batiste, Lizette Carrion, Brad Henke, Mark L. Young, Sam Witwer
